name: Pentol: Madness
description:
Far in the future, in dystopian earth, humans are contamined with many kinds of radioactive that make it difficult for them to think sanely. All they can think is eat and survive, no matter how. One day, a mysterious chef, who isn't affected by the radiation, make a 'pentol' with secret ingredient. So powerful that the ingredient and the radiation in the air miraculously bring the 'pentol' alive. His name is Arlo. The chef, still shocked about the miracle, warns the pentol that humans will start to chase him to eat it alive.

This is our submission on Internal Game Jam 10 of EEPIS Gametech. We were given 48 hour to complete the game with this choice of genre: hack & slash, gravity, culture, cyberpunk, and 'pentol air fryer. In the end we choose to combine all the genre above in a single, simple endless runner game.

The team consist of:

  • Arlo - Game Designer, Programmer
  • Muhammad Jibril Wathon - Game Designer
  • Muhammad Ihmal Putra - Game Programmer
  • Achmad Bhekti Ramadhani - Game Artist, Designer
  • Wahyu Indra Maulana - Sound Engineer
  • Mu'taqid Khaqqul Kholil - Game Artist

We've also made the prototype with Construct 2 which you can play here:
https://www.construct.net/en/free-online-games/pentol-madness-prototype-42661/play (Can be played on Android or Desktop)
